game.name: Lewthwaite's Game
game.pieces: Black and White pieces. All 24 pieces are placed on the board alternating black and white. All spaces are filled except the middle.
game.tomove: Players move either vertically or horizontally into an open spot.
game.rules: Players alternate turns either moving vertically or horizontally into an open spot. The first person to stalemate the other player (they cannot move) wins the game.
